name: toilet_brush
description: Rubbermaid Commercial Toilet Bowl Brush with Plastic Handle. Polypropylene Fill, 1.13-Inch Trim Length, 14.5-Inch Length, White. The Rubbermaid Commercial Products Toilet Brush with Plastic Handle is ideal for commercial, medical, and industrial applications. The sturdy plastic toilet bowl brush handle is suited for moderate to heavy cleaning. A hole near the end of the toilet brush handle allows the toilet cleaning brush to be hung for storage. The white polypropylene bristles are resistant to stains, odors, bacteria, fungi, and wear.
